Sentencas: The expansion of the human population and improved living conditions for a sizable portion of people are the primary forces behind adopting sustainable energy production technologies (besides fossil-fuel combustion).
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Fuel cells play a significant and productive role in energy transition by offering efficient and clean energy conversion among various energy production technologies.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are the most cost-effective and practical alternative for industrial use.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: However, the expensive cost limits its commercialization due to the high operational temperature (>750 degrees C) of electrolyte materials.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Thus, low-temperature (<500 degrees C) SOFCs are low-cost and attractive for commercialization, but the lack of electrolyte materials is hindering their progress.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Our objective is to present progress on new functional semiconductor-ionic material (SIM)/semiconductor membranes (SM) that may provide new paths for the R&D of SOFCs.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Further, we study SM/SIM materials detailed properties and the nanoscale electrochemistry phenomena of SIMs to bring new concepts and ways for developing advanced SOFCs.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: A novel idea of a nano-SOFC that replaces the traditional electrolyte layer with an SIM or SM which is different from the conventional SOFCs, is presented.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Also, we have highlighted how the redox reaction influences the ion's transportation in SIM/SM.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: Also, we have discussed the SIM/SM significance, limitations, challenges, and future perspectives.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: The proposed device can display superior performance, even in the low operating temperature range.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology

Sentencas: This review is a state-of-the-art survey on this new frontier subject covering materials, technologies, devices, and fundamentals, and emphasizing this unique area's scientific bases and prospects.
Titulo: Semiconductor-membrane fuel cell (SMFC) for renewable energy technology
